name: intercompany-reconciliation
displayName: SAP S/4HANA Cloud for intelligent intercompany reconciliation
description: Intelligent Intercompany Reconciliation is introduced to speed up your intercompany reconciliation process from company close to corporate close. The service is based on Artificial Intelligence in order to reconcile your financial data with high accuracy.

servicePlans.name: standard
servicePlans.description: Default standard plan for Intelligent Intercompany Reconciliation.
